page.title: 18Shopping-Brenchley/Matfield.
page.content:
Both villages offer{Post Office, {General Stores,Butchers}and{Newsagent} facilities.Concentrating on everyday items,our findings reflect villagers shopping habits,and their use and opinion of the village shops.
{1.69% did their main shopping weekly. 2.TONBRIDGE was the clear favourite as their main place to shop. {3.The type of shop used most was { overwhelmingly SUPERMARKETS. 4.In using the village for shopping: 5% said always,58% often,35% rarely { }showing they do fulfill a need as { }only 2% said never. {5.In providing what the villagers { needed they considered the shops to { be fair to good.} 6.Of those who said they would like an additional shop in their village _ CHEMIST _ was the most requested.
